from bitcoin.core import CTransaction
from bitcoin.core import b2x
import bitcoin

bitcoin.SelectParams('testnet')

def decode_transaction(hex_tx):
    tx_bytes = bytes.fromhex(hex_tx)
    tx = CTransaction.deserialize(tx_bytes)
    print("Version:", tx.nVersion)
    print("Inputs:", len(tx.vin))
    for i, txin in enumerate(tx.vin):
        print(f"\nInput {i+1}:")
        print("  TXID:", b2x(txin.prevout.hash[::-1]))
        print("  Vout:", txin.prevout.n)
        print("  ScriptSig:", b2x(txin.scriptSig))
        print("  Sequence:", txin.nSequence)
    print("\nOutputs:", len(tx.vout))
    for i, txout in enumerate(tx.vout):
        print(f"\nOutput {i+1}:")
        print("  Value (sats):", txout.nValue)
        print("  ScriptPubKey:", b2x(txout.scriptPubKey))
    print("\nLocktime:", tx.nLockTime)

hex_tx = ""
decode_transaction(hex_tx)
